author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were arrested in connection with the stone throwing incident on a TNSTC bus in Mandaicaud on Friday.

According to police, a town bus proceeding to Nagercoil from Mulloorthurai stopped at Mandaicaud junction. The driver started blowing the air horn asking the car parked in front of the bus to give way.

Irked over this, one Keni and Leon of Pudhur confronted the bus driver. After exchanging heated arguments for a while, the duo started throwing stones on the bus damaging the windscreen.

The bus driver, Prasad, attached to Colachel TNSTC depot lodged a complaint with the Mandaicaud police.

Mandaicaud police registered a case and arrested the duo. Both of them were remanded after being produced before a local court on Saturday.
title: Two persons held
